title: plez help me.... (eror http servers)
body: hey.. when i am trying to start my games a Little window comes up and say`(couldent connect to the http server. plez check your internet Connection and that your firewall is not blocking access) wath should i do?

replies.body:
This specific error is indicating there are problems with your client reaching the servers. More often than not, this is a direct result of settings that are local to your network that are blocking the client from hitting the servers. Our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a good place to start. 

Let me know if those steps helped resolve this.
